title: Delivered to the Alien Mates
description: I’ve never even had a boyfriend before— but now two aliens have ordered me as their bride...My father’s trying to marry me off to his business partner, so I sign up for Starlight Matchmaking to escape and get married quick.Except, there’s gotta be some mistake because the agency sets me up with not one but two alien beasts.They’re rugged warriors, ready to retire and work the land—and impregnate their mate.To be honest, the two of them scare the hell out of me. Their scales and horns are enough to scare away any humans on the Mars settlement—present company included. But they’re willing to risk it all to protect me when the local warlord tries to frame me for a crime.But I wonder, would they still feel this way about me if they knew my secret. That I’m not the girl that the matchmaking agency says I am…
author: Viki Storm
